p: In conclusion, our study found that gut microbial structure was modulated by SZC (the Chinese herbal formula) during the alleviation of CID. Especially, at genus level, SZC significantly inhibited the growth of potential pathogens closely related to diarrhea, including Clostridiumm, Bacteroides, Parabacteroides, Alloprevotella, Acinetobacter and Pseudomonas. These results indicated that gut microbial modulation was associated with the anti-diarrheal activity of SZC.
